segments.text: Excuse me , sir . Are there only 3 programs in your hotel ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course not . We have 50 channels in all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well . I am afraid it must be my fault . Can you send someone here to help me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I will send a maid to your room right now .
segments.speaker: S2
